scripts.install:all: uv pip install -e .[dev] && cd web && pnpm install
scripts.format: black . && cd web && pnpm run format
scripts.lint: ruff check . && cd web && pnpm run lint:biome
scripts.lint:fix: ruff check . --fix && cd web && pnpm run lint:biome:fix
scripts.typecheck: mypy . && cd web && pnpm run typecheck
scripts.test: pytest && cd web && pnpm run test
